summary: The diff shows that LoginSignup.tsx was modified to implement a 4-step flow including an OTP step with a simulated 6-digit OTP displayed in a styled gold info box, a 3-attempt limit, 5-minute expiry, and a Resend OTP option. The file summary description aligns well with all REQ-14 acceptance criteria. However, since only a summary of the file is provided (not the actual code diff), some implementation details cannot be fully verified.

hallucinated_features.reason: The diff summary mentions a 'Resend OTP option' which was not requested in REQ-14. The requirement only specifies generating OTP on Continue, invalidating after 3 failed attempts, and requiring the user to restart â€” no resend functionality was requested.
